feed.title: Mauricio Tavares Ozaki
feed.subtitle: More about me and social media links

entry.title: My ‘personal’ project
entry.content:
Despite my love for programming, sometimes we need to stop coding and do some different things! One of my favorite hobbies is pop culture! I love movies, tv series and books! Me and my friends created a blog/podcast called Tropa Dercy where we talk about movies like Batman, series from Marvel (and others) or books like ‘Battle Royale’. I would invite you to visit our blog and see what we are doing!

PS: I strongly recommend our ‘movies lists’!

Go to Tropa Dercy:
entry.summary: More information about my blog about por culture!

entry.title: My new GitHub Page
entry.content:
Hello, World!

I couldn’t start my new page without write the most tradicional quote from devs.

Well, I downloaded this beautiful theme for GitHub Page, but I’m not a Ruby dev. I’ve been studing since yesterday and I’m remembering many thing about Jekyll, but I need to study more and more.

I think until next weekend I will have finished configure all this blog.

That is it!

Seen you soon!
